abstract: Venezuelan officials open investigation into disappearance of 28 mine workers in Bolivar; relatives of miners believe they were murdered in dispute over gold claim.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Venezuela: Relatives Fear a Massacre After 28 Gold Miners Disappear
headline.main: Venezuela: Relatives Fear a Massacre After 28 Gold Miners Disappear

snippet: Relatives of the missing miners have said that they were murdered Friday in a dispute over a gold claim.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of the missing miners have said that they were murdered Friday in a dispute over a gold claim.
